data.title: Las Vegas Golf Hall of Fame 2023 Inductee Video – Todd Roberts – SNGA
data.text:
Todd Roberts is a top Southern Nevada Golf Association amateur golfer who has won three state senior amateurs, multiple player of the year honors and more than 30 tournaments. He also very quietly helps golf causes through philanthropy and other efforts.

Please enjoy his 2023 Las Vegas Golf Hall of Fame Induction video.

On Oct. 7, he was inducted into the Las Vegas Golf Hall of Fame along with Chuck Bombard, Tim Cashman, Jim Hart and Warren Schutte. The event was the official kickoff for the Shriners Children’s Open PGA Tour event and was held in the new Club360 venue.

In all, there are 71 Las Vegas Golf Hall of Fame inductees. They are listed at the end of this article.

Art Sellinger, Class of 2011, served as the evening’s emcee. The event features a conversational-style induction process with each inductee being interviewed by Sellinger.

Speaking on the video for Roberts were previous inductees Frank Acker, Brady Exber and Butch Harmon, along with top amateur Kevin Marsh.

Las Vegas Golf Hall of Fame Inductees
